sect1.title: Feedback
sect1.para: We would like to hear your comments and suggestions about this manual. Feel free to write to our mailing list at opensuse-buildservice@opensuse.org (subscription required) or, preferably, use Bugzilla (Classification: openSUSE, Product: openSUSE.org, Component: Documentation).

sect1.title: Source Code
sect1.para: The source code of this book is publicly available through Subversion. To download the source code, proceed as outlined at FIXME. To build the book, see the directions at FIXME.

sect1.title: About the Making of This Manual
sect1.para: This book is written in DocBook. The XML source files were validated by xmllint, processed by xsltproc, and converted into XSL-FO using a customized version of Norman Walsh's stylesheets. The final PDF is formatted through fop from Apache.
